TMNT Blu-ray
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Warner Bros. | 2007 | 87 mins | Rated PG | Aug 07, 2007

After the defeat of their old arch nemesis, The Shredder, the Turtles have grown apart as a family. Struggling to keep them together, their rat sensei, Master Splinter, becomes worried when strange things begin to brew in New York City. Tech-industrialist Max Winters is amassing an army of ancient monsters to apparently take over the world.
